So far this is meets and exceeds almost all of my expectations. With all that said I had to reinstall windows on first boot because sleep mode would not work period. customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable Computer

The AMD Ryzen 5 chip process speed enables the X360 to perform very well even with large graphics intensive programs. I didn't buy this computer for the 2 in 1 feature however it a pretty cool never the less.

customer_reviews.title: Great computer if your vision isn't great
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I really like it. It has a backlit keyboard which was really important for me. It also has really big keys. I'm pretty nearsighted so this is important to me. The screen is really clear and large, which is alos great for my vision. It's really fast and the touchscreen is super sensitive, which i like as well. I'm a grad student so this has more than enough features for me. The set up was really easy and went very smoothly. It just copied everything from my old system onto my new system so I didn't have to start from scratch. I'm not a techie so I cant give you more technical info. Sorry!

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product for one specific reason. The laptop overheats very often for no reason at all. If left unattended for five (5) or more minutes the screen goes black and the laptop becomes extremely hot and stays this way until the battery dies. Only then are you able to have use/access again. It is extremely frustrating as I bought this laptop to assist with work. Extremely extremely disappointed, had it not been for this issue I would highly recommend that laptop. Note I've only owned this laptop for approximately 2 weeks.

Also, it shows it advertised with a pen, but if you look closely, it does not come with it, and it takes a very specific very expensive pen. Universal will NOT work!

customer_reviews.title: Warranty repair service sucks

A month later, still waiting on repair and ship back for a $10 part I could have fixed in an hour. Not happy with HPs repair techs. Laptop itself is good, phone techs are very responsive. Actual techs repairing are terribly slow and wasting our time.

We have to leave it on a tablet stand or propped against the wall when on but not in use to keep the air circulating.

The 256 Gb SSD is on the smaller side compared to the ubiquitous 1 Tb HDD although the speed is good. A very good product.
